entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SARIF 2.1.0 §3.27.23 violation: Only suppressed results have a `suppressions` property #62894

Closed

  • Add speedometer tests for Roslyn features #57607
    17.3
  • Interpolated string isn't evaluated constantly when mixed with variables #62892

PullRequests

Created

  • Features/decon switch target typing #62896
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Derive unnecessary imports analyzer from AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62895
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove unneeded SupportedDiagnostics override #62893
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #62888
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #62887
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62891
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62889
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #62890
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Derive type names analyzer from AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62869
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
